message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $110. I think it would be very valuable for you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay $95 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $105?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I am comfortable paying $100 for the product.
